mapper.select: select team_id as teamId, team_name as teamName, staff_id as staffId, staff_name as staffName, position as position, parent_id as parentId, level as level from hrbp_projectTeam where team_id = ${teamId}

select employeeId as staffId, employeeName as staffName from base_staff_info where 1=1
AND pdu = '${pdu}'
AND sex = '${gender}'
AND workplace = '${area}'
AND costcenter = '${cu}'
AND employeeName like '%${name}%'
AND employeeId like '%${staffId}%'

select distinct workPlaceArea as area, costCenter as cu from base_staff_info
where pdu = '${pdu}'
